item.title: Executing Code on Python Package Installs - Malicious Pypi
item.description: #Foreword Multiple researchers in the community have given dependency confusion and other supply chain attacks a bad name recently. While there are very valid reasons to perform this attack, please do not pollute pypi or any other package manager with typosquatting, stolen code, or other non-targetted attacks in the name of security research. It’s no different than spreading malware. The point has been made. Please be responsible. #Executing code on package install
